description.message: This is a browser extension that adds bash shell-like keyboard shortcuts to textboxes.

delete_to_the_end_of_the_line.message: Delete to the end of the line
delete_to_the_end_of_the_line.description: Delete to the end of the line

move_cursor_to_the_next_character.message: Move cursor to the next character
move_cursor_to_the_next_character.description: Move cursor to the next character

move_cursor_to_the_previous_character.message: Move cursor to the previous character
move_cursor_to_the_previous_character.description: Move cursor to the previous character

move_cursor_to_the_next_word.message: Move cursor to the next word
move_cursor_to_the_next_word.description: Move cursor to the next word

move_cursor_to_the_previous_word.message: Move cursor to the previous word
move_cursor_to_the_previous_word.description: Move cursor to the previous word

delete_to_the_beginning_of_the_line.message: Delete to the beginning of the line
delete_to_the_beginning_of_the_line.description: Delete to the beginning of the line
